weekly_14_days_forecast.title: 14-days incidence forecast
weekly_14_days_forecast.info: The forecast is based on the model described in the following scientific paper:
weekly_14_days_forecast.scientific_paper_1: Zhao H., Merchant N. N., McNulty A., Radcliff T. A., Cote M. J., Fischer R. S. B., et al.. (2021). COVID-19: Short term prediction model using daily incidence data. PLoS ONE, 16(4 April), 1â€“14. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0250110
